overview:
I am Gardi Hewawasam Dange Chinthaka Sanjeewa. I am a Sri Lankan. I would like to share my knowledge with others around the world. That is why I have designed this site. I invite you to visit my web site.

I have been working as a animation and graphic designer in National Online Distance Education Service, Content Development Unit : CDU

FAVORITE LINKS. :: Search with MSN :: ICT for Professional Education. :: LBS for Higher Education. :: Sri Lanka’s No.1 Footwear.

MY PORTFOLIO. This is just a few professional performances that I have done so far. I have designed the banner of NODES web. Some of the Universities and institutions to which I have supported., :: University of Colombo :: Sri Lanka Institute of Marketing (SLIM) :: Post Graduate institute of Medicine :: Ladies College :: Winston College :: Indination Institute

ACADEMIC QUALIFICATION. :: University of Colombo - UCSC - I was awarded a certificate for Computer Advanced Multimedia Web Design and Development Techniques at the Institute of Computer Technology in the University of Colombo.

:: Raytronics Computers (Pvt) Ltd - I was awarded a Diploma in Network Administration Course at Raytronics Computers (Pvt) Ltd. (Windows 2000/XP/NT, Server and workstation, Installations, Caballing, LAN/WAN TCP/IP, Backup network with Unattended installation, Disk management, Internet information web server(IIS), Domain naming server(DNS), DHCP, Proxy server setting up Active directory servers-mail server and Remote access server)

:: IDM (Pvt) Ltd - I was awarded a Diploma In Computer Studies at IDM (MS Excel, MS Word, MS Access, Java, Visual Basic, HTML, SQL Server Database Management)

:: Master Works (Pvt) Ltd - I was awarded a certificate for Diploma in Computer Graphics at Master Works Education Center.(Adobe Illustrator ver 10, Adobe Photoshop ver 7.0, Adobe PageMaker ver 7.1, Scanning and Printing.)
